actions.name: Get version details
actions.description:
Gets detailed information about a specified version
 of the Identity API.

responses.body:

actions.name: Get extension details
actions.description:
Gets detailed information for a specified
 extension.

actions.name: Authenticate for Admin API
actions.description:
Authenticates and generates a
 token.
 Client authentication is provided through a ReST
 interface by using the POST method with v2.0/tokens
 supplied as the path. Include a payload of credentials
 in the body.
 The Identity API is a ReSTful web service. It is the
 entry point to all service APIs. To access the
 Identity API, you must know its URL.
 Each ReST request against the Identity Service
 requires the X-Auth-Token header. Clients
 obtain this token, along with the URL to other service
 APIs, by first authenticating against Identity with
 valid credentials.
 If the authentication token has expired, a
 401 response code is
 returned.
 If the token specified in the request body has
 expired, this call returns a
 404 response code.
 Identity treats expired tokens as invalid
 tokens.
 The deployment determines how long expired tokens
 are stored.

actions.name: Validate token
actions.description:
Validates a token and confirms that
 it belongs to a specified tenant.
 Returns the permissions relevant to a particular
 client. Valid tokens are in the
 /tokens/{tokenId} path. A user should
 expect an itemNotFound (404) fault for an
 token that is not valid.

belongsTo.description:
Validates that a token
 has the specified tenant in scope, for
 performance. Valid tokens are in the
 /tokens/{tokenId}
 path. An itemNotFound
 (404) fault is
 returned for a token that is not
 valid.

responses.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<access xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0">
 <token id="ab48a9efdfedb23ty3494"
 expires="2010-11-01T03:32:15-05:00">
 <tenant id="456" name="My Project"/>
 </token>
 <user id="123" username="jqsmith">
 <roles
 xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0">
 <role id="123" name="Admin" tenantId="one"/>
 <role id="234" name="object-store:admin"
 tenantId="1"/>
 </roles>
 </user>
</access>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<access xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0">
 <token id="ab48a9efdfedb23ty3494"
 expires="2010-11-01T03:32:15-05:00">
 <tenant id="456" name="My Project"/>
 </token>
 <user id="123" username="jqsmith">
 <roles
 xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0">
 <role id="123" name="Admin" tenantId="one"/>
 <role id="234" name="object-store:admin"
 tenantId="1"/>
 </roles>
 </user>
</access>

actions.name: Validate token (admin)
actions.description:
Validates a token and confirms that
 it belongs to a specified tenant, for performance.

belongsTo.description:
Validates that a token
 has the specified tenant in scope, for
 performance. Valid tokens are in the
 /tokens/{tokenId}
 path. An itemNotFound
 (404) fault is
 returned for a token that is not
 valid.

actions.name: List endoints for token
actions.description:
Lists the endpoints associated with
 a specified token.

X-Auth-Token.description:
A valid authentication token for
 an administrative user.

actions.name: Get user information by name
actions.description:
Gets detailed information about a
 specified user by user name.

responses.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<user xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0"
 enabled="true" email="john.smith@example.org" name="jqsmith"
 id="u1000"/>

X-Auth-Token.description:
A valid authentication token for
 an administrative user.

actions.name: Get user information by ID
actions.description:
Gets detailed information about a
 specified user by user ID.

responses.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<user xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0"
 enabled="true" email="john.smith@example.org" name="jqsmith"
 id="u1000"/>

X-Auth-Token.description:
A valid authentication token for
 an administrative user.

actions.name: List user global roles
actions.description:
Lists global roles for a specified
 user. Excludes tenant roles.

responses.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<roles xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0">
 <role id="123" name="Admin" description="All Access"/>
 <role id="234" name="Guest" description="Guest Access"/>
</roles>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<roles xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0">
 <role id="123" name="Admin" description="All Access"/>
 <role id="234" name="Guest" description="Guest Access"/>
</roles>

X-Auth-Token.description:
A valid authentication token for
 an administrative user.

actions.name: List tenants
actions.description:
Lists all tenants.
 
 
 GET /v2.0/tokens/tenants HTTP/1.1
Host: identity.api.openstack.org
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: fa8426a0-8eaf-4d22-8e13-7c1b16a9370c
Accept: application/json

marker.description:
The ID of the last item in the
 previous list.

responses.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<tenants xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0">
 <tenant enabled="true" id="1234" name="ACME Corp">
 <description>A description...</description>
 </tenant>
 <tenant enabled="true" id="3645" name="Iron Works">
 <description>A description...</description>
 </tenant>
</tenants>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<tenants xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0">
 <tenant enabled="true" id="1234" name="ACME Corp">
 <description>A description...</description>
 </tenant>
 <tenant enabled="true" id="3645" name="Iron Works">
 <description>A description...</description>
 </tenant>
</tenants>

actions.name: Get tenant information by name
actions.description:
Gets detailed information about a
 specified tenant by name.

marker.description:
The ID of the last item in the
 previous list.

responses.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<tenant xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0"
 enabled="true" id="1234" name="ACME Corp">
 <description>A description...</description>
</tenant>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<tenant xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0"
 enabled="true" id="1234" name="ACME Corp">
 <description>A description...</description>
</tenant>

A valid authentication token for
 an administrative user.

actions.name: Get tenant information by ID

 specified tenant by ID.

responses.body:

X-Auth-Token.description:
A valid authentication token for
 an administrative user.

actions.name: List roles for user
actions.description:
Lists roles for a specified user on
 a specified tenant. Excludes global roles.

responses.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<roles xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0">
 <role id="123" name="Admin" description="All Access"/>
 <role id="234" name="Guest" description="Guest Access"/>
</roles>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<roles xmlns="http://docs.openstack.org/identity/api/v2.0">
 <role id="123" name="Admin" description="All Access"/>
 <role id="234" name="Guest" description="Guest Access"/>
</roles>
